title: El Morro National Monument: Plants
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Nature     Plants               Plants        Wildflowers abound throughout El Morro National Monument. NPS Photo Dale Dombrowski   Â         El Morro is home to a variety of plant communities from woodlands of Gambel oak, ponderosa and pinion pines, and three species of junipers, to sprawling shortgrass prairies. The monument also is home to an array of wildflowers that bloom all through the spring, summer and fall. Around the pond at the base of El Morro you can even find cattails!
